text:
William Grawn Milliken (March 26, 1922 – October 18, 2019) was an American politician. He served as the 44th Governor of Michigan from January 22, 1969 to January 1, 1983. He was a member of the Republican Party.
Milliken was born in Traverse City, Michigan. He died on October 18, 2019 in Traverse City at the age of 97.
